cont.entity_a: Great sound quality with clean and clear acoustics. Sound quality highlights details in music and movies. Sound quality degrades with poor audio sources.
cont.entity_b: Better sound quality with simulated surround compared to older models. Sound quality is good but construction is poor, leading to breakages.

cont.entity_a: Comfortable fit even for extended use.
cont.entity_b: Improved fit and better wireless connectivity.

cont.entity_a: Open-ear design causes some sound leakage, not ideal for public use. Headphones are a bit heavy after prolonged use. Good for listening at home but not for noise isolation.
cont.entity_b: Minimal sound leakage makes them suitable for late-night use. Comfortable and lightweight design.

cont.entity_a: Durable with minor plastic cracking after years of use.
cont.entity_b: Mixed reviews on durability and material quality.

cont.entity_a: Long cable can be cumbersome but allows flexibility.
Bass is decent but not overpowering.
Excellent value for the price, especially if found on sale.

cont.entity_b: Improved fit and better wireless connectivity.

cont.entity_a: Sennheiser provides good customer service for replacements.

cont.entity_b: Excellent battery life with an extra battery included. Proprietary battery limits replacement options.
Limited range and issues with static noise when moving.
Good reception within the home and yard.
Volume control is not easily accessible.
